#Background

  ** Language Family**: Indo-European / Celtic / Brittonic / Western / Welsh

#Phonology


  ##Consonants

    ###Stops
      [b] [k] [d] [g] [t] [p]

    ###Affricates
      [tʃ] [dʒ]

    ###Fricatives
      [f] [θ] [s] [ʃ] [χ] [ɬ] [h] [ð] [v]

    ###Sonorants
      [m] [n] [ŋ] [m̥] [n̥] [ŋ̊]
      [l]  [r̥] [r] [j] [w]


 

##Vowels

    ###Short Vowels

      [a] [ɛ] [ɪ] [ɔ] [ɨ] [ʊ] [ə]

    ###Long Vowels

      [aː] [eː] [iː] [oː] [ɨː] [uː] 

    ###Dipthongs

              [ɔɨ]  [ɔɪ]
              
              [aɪ]  [aɨ]  [aʊ]
              
              [ɪʊ]
  
              [əʊ]  [əɪ]  [əɨ]
              
              [ʊɪ]  [ʊɨ]
              
              [ɑɨ]
        
              [ɛʊ]
        
              [ɨʊ]  
      

#Alphabet 

    Aa = [a]
    
    Bb = [b]
    
    Cc = [k]
    
    CHch = [χ]
    
    Dd = [d]
    
    DDdd = [ð]
    
    Ee = [ɛ] or [eː]
    
    Ff = [v]
    
    FFff = [f]
    
    Gg = [g]
    
    NGng = [ŋ]
    
    Hh = [h]
    
    Ii = [ɪ] or [iː]
    
    Ll = [l]
    
    LLll = [ɬ]
    
    Mm = [m]
    
    Nn = [n]
    
    Oo =  [ɔ] or [oː]
    
    Pp = [p]
    
    PHph = [f]
    
    Rr = [r]
    
    RHrh = [r̥]
    
    Ss = [s]
    
    Tt = [t]
    
    THth = [θ]
    
    Uu = [ɪ] or [ɨ] or [iː]
    
    Ww = [ʊ] or [uː]
    
    Yy = [ɨ] or [ə]
